channel.title: Crisis on Raj Patil
channel.description: Recent content in Crisis on Raj Patil

item.title: Do you really wanna be a Polymath?
item.description: Do note that this is an old post (from my last archived blog) that I’m refactoring : more on that here The Unaltered Entry [2022-04-17 Sun 17:09] - 8021 3 hours ago, I encountered a semantic crisis. It all started with the thought that I’m not really prepared for a lot of things in life. Now, that in itself is a toxic thought - one can never be prepared for it all but I definitely have time to figure out several things with minimal extra effort.
